intersectionShader() - Method in class org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkRayTracingShaderGroupCreateInfoKHR.Buffer
 
intersectionShader() - Method in class org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkRayTracingShaderGroupCreateInfoKHR
the index of the intersection shader from VkRayTracingPipelineCreateInfoKHR::pStages in the group if the shader group has type of RAY_TRACING_SHADER_GROUP_TYPE_PROCEDURAL_HIT_GROUP_KHR, and SHADER_UNUSED_KHR otherwise.

io_uring_setup(int, IOURingParams) - Static method in class org.lwjgl.system.linux.liburing.LibIOURing
The io_uring_setup() system call sets up a submission queue (SQ) and completion queue (CQ) with at least entries entries, and returns a file descriptor which can be used to perform subsequent operations on the io_uring instance.
